website_summaries.verdict: A chemical-free sunscreen that provides good sun protection for multiple skin types.
pros: Customers appreciate that this sunscreen is non-chemical and has a good EWG rating, as well as the fact it goes on easily
Most felt it provided excellent sun protection for babies and toddlers
It also stands out for having an unobtrusive fragrance and being long-lasting
cons: a few felt other brands worked better

customer_reviews.title: Not good for eczema
customer_reviews.text: While this sunscreen seems to offer good protection from the sun, it causes our baby's eczema to flare up terribly. Each time I've tried it, her little cheeks get so red and inflamed. I would not recommend this if your baby has sensitive skin and is proned to eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read the winning reviews, but after 8 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the winning reviews, but after 8 hours and 3 applications at Typhoon Lagoon, I was unimpressed and burned. Seemed to serve same purpose as wearing a windbreaker at Chernobyl. I'm going back to BurnOut for Kids.
customer_reviews.author: beckdavenport

customer_reviews.title: Incredible stuff. <3
customer_reviews.text: We. love. this. stuff. My 3.5 yr old was refusing to put sunscreen on until I got him this stuff. It really does rub in so well and has a nice smell. And does it work? You bet! After being in the son a lot my redheaded very pale kiddos (2 of them!) barely have even a tan line. Its remarkable and honestly -- we are not super good re-appliers so they get a coat, maybe a 2nd one late in the day and that's it. Really impressed and love that it gets such great marks on EWG's list.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lubetsky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. While the ingredients are great and safe it made my kids eyes sting horribly and my baby was miserable all day even after I tried to wash it out. His face was red and blotchy with eyes watering and red until the next day. Will not put this on my kids again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Here is what I do: For water activities, I use thinkbaby. It's the way to go. I even add zinc oxide powder to make it stronger. My family doesn't do that step because they are not crazy like me and they don't burn at all. The other product that is extremely similar to this is Burnout, but this is basically the same thing and it's cheaper if you get this 6 oz bottle. For my face, water activities or not, I use Badger or Raw Elements. For non-water activities, I use Beauty By Earth. It's not waterproof at all, but it's nice and simple. Don't buy any titanium dioxide stuff. It's not as good as just pure zinc.
customer_reviews.author: Anneka S.

customer_reviews.title: Eco-friendly and effective
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended as an eco-friendly choice to prevent coral reef bleaching. My fair-skinned daughter and her friends tested it in the tropics and said it was effective. Her words: "If you think coral reefs are beautiful, and if you want to help protect them, there ARE alternatives--two options I've tried that work are "ThinkBaby" and "Stream2Sea." Both protect well as long as they're applied at least half an hour before going in the water, and that's from the perspective of someone with very sensitive skin. I prefer ThinkBaby, as it smells nicer and is more easily absorbed into the skin."
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for health, protection, and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Both of my girls (ages 1 and 2.5) have sensitive skin and are prone to eczema. This sunscreen we LOVE because it has a delightful citrus-y scent, and blends well into their skin. Other natural sunscreens tend to leave a very thick white film, but this one blends nearly completely. It also comes off your hands easily after applying. We live a mile or 2 from the beach, so we go there often and it lasts a long time. If you want to protect your babes from harmful chemicals, this is the best one I have found and tried after a lot of research.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of its safety rating and good reviews but my whole family ended up getting sun burned even with liberal use of it and making sure it absorbs into the skin before sun exposure. Super disappointed and ended up just throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Grace K.

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: It goes on white and thick but it's very easy to rub in. (I'm from Florida and it reminds of the stuff the lifeguards used to put on their noses when I was growing up.) I put it on every single morning since I had a skin cancer removed and I feel totally protected. Oh yeah, you can burn through your clothing too, so make sure to apply it everywhere! I've cut my large yard, which takes hours, and I did not get the slightest bit of pink on me. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great, lasts 80 mins in water
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen so much! It’s just thick enough that it feels like I’m protecting my children. It’s not so thick that it doesn’t rub in good. It has a delicious smell. I can’t describe it other than a bit citrusy. None of us have burned even when the temp is 112 outside and we’re in and out of the pool. I’m very pleased with my purchase and will absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: B_stein8

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a good non-toxic sunscreen that is easy to rub in, doesn't leave a thick white residue and actually protects from the sun. I've tried a LOT of sunscreens and this is by far my favorite. I initially bought it for the kids, but the whole family uses it. Rubs in well, prevents sunburns, smells good and doesn't cause any reactions with our sensitive skin. My only wish is that it came in an SPF 30 instead of just SPF 50.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: We put this to the test and love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this sunscreen for almost 2 years. On 3 kids and adults. We have a pool and especially this year with isolating due to pandemic, we spend most of our time out by the pool. This sunscreen has worked great! If we are going to be out all day it needs to be reapplied. It smells lovely and while it doesn’t blend as well as chemical lotions because of the zinc, it’s well worth it not to expose my family to cancer causing chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie Cantey

customer_reviews.title: High hopes but ultimately disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had read excellent reviews and received numerous recommendations, so I guess was expecting miracles from this cream. Not only did my son get a burn on the back of his neck after only moderate sun exposure at a soccer game, but both he and and my daughter (though not my younger son) have developed white, crusty skin on their cheeks and around mouth now that we’ve used it for a few consecutive days. I will use up the two bottles I bought but not buy this cream again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nicole

customer_reviews.title: At 62 I love that this protects me and is safe for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for some time now. It does go on white and takes a little while to go into the skin but I don't care. I have precancerous actinic keratosis all over my face, etc. I need to be careful about the sun and use good protection. I'd like this product because it is safe for my skin. I am 62 and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best safe sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have tried ALL the safe sunscreens, so save yourself some time and trust me when I say this is the best one. It has a consistency just like regular sunscreen - smooth and soft, not sticky or pasty like many natural sunscreens. It also absorbs better than any other safe sunscreen, almost disappearing. It is also really heavy duty - we used this on our entire family at the beach and no one, even the toddler, got even a hint of a sunburn. It’s low rating on EWG skin deep is amazing. I am so glad to finally have found the perfect sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Stapayr8485

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are outside a lot and I needed to find a sunblock that would be strong enough to protect their skin, yet gentle at the same time. I'm so thankful for this brand. It's been the only one so far that hasn't caused a reaction and have really protected their skin. My husband and I ended up using it as well since it has great coverage and little to no scent.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Our family favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: Only sunscreen we use for our entire family! Are you originally research this because we had a new baby and I didn’t want to put chemical sunscreen all over her body in the summer. I have found that this is the best sunscreen our family has ever used! We all love it and have never gotten a sunburn while using. I find it is easiest to apply when you put in your hand, warm it up in your hands and then spread on body.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SUNSCREEN!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sunscreen! I bought this to use on my baby because of all the safe ingredients. My husband and I use it too! It covers well and applies very easily! I also love the smell of it! I've had friends buy this product after they borrowed ours at the beach! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone of any age who is looking for a sunscreen that works and has safe ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: DRY looking skin
customer_reviews.text: I like that it does not have a strong smell and it seems to work. My only comment is when I repeatedly reapplied it to my skin ( we spent our entire day at an amusement park/ water park), my skin looked like it was extremely dry -especially my legs . It was embarrassing to walk around the park feeling like a reptile. I ended up slathering mayonnaise on my skin to erase my scales (don't judge). It worked but I smelled like salad dressing. I'll still use this product. I'll just make sure to bring lotion next time.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Good sunblock
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of the good rating on EWG. It doesn't have any oxybenzone, and it's protected my kids skin all year long without any sunburns! It's kind of thick, so spreading on the skin is not particularly easy, but I know that the thickness is also what protects them. The bottle lasts quite a long time, and i use it daily with my kids. I've bought a few of these bottles and I'll continue to as long as the price is reasonable. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amie A.

customer_reviews.title: Only sunscreen I buy!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is the best! This is my second summer using it and my son has never gotten burned with it on. Also, I've been allergic to sunscreen my whole life so I was worried when I had my first child that I wasn't ever gonna be able to put sunscreen on him without getting a reaction. This is the ONLY sunscreen that doesn't give me an allergic reaction!! I use it myself now, and still in shock it works for me. I only wish they had it in a spray!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen on the market. Allergen friendly. Reef safe. Easy to apply. Good consistency (not too runny, not gritty, not separated). Lasts long even in the water (although you should still reapply). I also love think sport for the family. Great product
customer_reviews.author: RO C.

customer_reviews.title: smell good, a little white
customer_reviews.text: The sunshine is really strong in CA, and my son gets hurt when playing outside for a long time. I bought this product based on the product review and reputation. It smells good but will make my son too white like fake face, and it's not easy and takes a little while to spread. It's suitable for the sensitive skin. My whole family are sensitive skins and there is no allerge after using it. The volume is big, and this product may work for this whole summer or even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shila

customer_reviews.title: Old!?
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen and have bought from this seller before. However, the most recent one we got must be old because it doesn't work at all. Very frustrating when you have a toddler who got burned because you trusted the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I take medications that make me hyper-sensitive to sunlight and I burn like a piece of bacon with any exposure over a few minutes. Every place I applied this sunblock did not get burnt during a beach day. Meanwhile, I used a different brand on other parts of my body, and those parts were badly burnt. Plus, I missed a few spots while applying this to my son's face, and he ended up with a weird burn pattern. I could see exactly where he had the sunblock because those areas were normal color.
customer_reviews.author: ThreatLevelMidnight

customer_reviews.title: Offers great sun protection and safe
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen for little ones. My 2 year old has very sensitive skin and this has never caused her any issues. I've been using this brand since my 6 year old was a baby and he has never gotten sunburned while wearing it -and we are frequent beach and pool goers and spend a lot of time in the water
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: It smells nice and goes on easy
customer_reviews.text: Used this on our 1.5 year old in May on our Maui vacation. Did not have any skin irritation issues and she made it through the vacation sunburn free! It smells nice and goes on easy. I did end up using this sunscreen on myself and thought it was great. Beware - after exiting the pool or ocean you will have a visible white film on your skin. It does take some elbow grease to get this off skin in the shower (not a bad thing since I'd rather know it's doing it's job being waterproof and protecting my little girl).
customer_reviews.author: Nora's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Your typical American sunscreen, just natural
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is really thick and I highly recommend avoiding your eyes area at all costs because when you rub some of this into your eyes it makes them burn nearly all day it’s very annoying I originally gave this two stars but given how natural this is I went with three. This is pretty much your typical American sunscreen. All in all, I wont be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply, sticky...
customer_reviews.text: I use the Think baby shampoo for my kids and love it. I really wanted to like this but sadly, don’t love. It’s hard to apply and needs a lot of rubbing to get it into the skin. Even after rubbing in it still leaves a white cast. It also leaves the skin a little greasy and sticky. I use it because despite all this, I’d rather use this than all the other toxic ones on the market. I just wish it were better...
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Cake-y white appearance
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on it’s EWG rating and my family has been using this since last year. The downside of this product is it’s cake-y white appearance when applied. Hopefully they’s gonna develop a product that blends to the skin and not look obvious when used.
customer_reviews.author: J and J

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen worked perfectly for most of us during a ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen worked perfectly for most of us during a week long trip in Destin. We are very pale and had no sunburns (despite not being used to the Florida sun). However, I did end up with a topical allergic reaction, and believe I have narrowed it down to this product. It's the only thing new I was exposed to, as we brought all our shampoos, soaps, lotions, etc from home. However, the rest of my family seemed to wear it without problems. I'd buy again to use on them, especially because I feel safe putting it on my baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: bethrn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 2 kids and husband for our trip to Thailand. Reapplied every 3 hours. Not a single sunburn on anyone. Usually my husband is very sensitive and burn easily in 30mins of sun exposure. My 1 yo didn't have any allergic reaction to this. My 5 yo was always in the pool or ocean. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Batzul

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spread, not too thick, great for my kids and even I use it too! Started buying last summer and continue to do so this year. I also like the face stick they sell. Priced well compared to some other brands. Healthier than other sunscreens!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill4115

customer_reviews.title: Good product 👍
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my toddler based on recommendations and I like it. The ingredients are good and the percentage of Zinc Oxide is quite satisfactory. The consistency is thick and there was no white cast residue after blending in well. But for those with darker skin, it may leave behind a white cast. As for me, I am actually happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mariyah Abbas

customer_reviews.title: great ingredients, but so so texture--grainy and a little greasy
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this brand by a friend, who uses it on her young daughter. When I tried it over the summer, I liked it. But the batch I received--exactly the same model as my friend's--feels more greasy. And I can feel granulates in the cream every time I apply it. Maybe they've changed the formula??? Not sure I will buy it again. I will keep looking for alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Wang

customer_reviews.title: Very thick & white!
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to find a sun block for my husband who has had melanoma & needs to stay protected. I've heard some of the sun blocks contain bad ingredients that soak into the skin so tried this one. We thought the ingredients were ok but it's very thick, plus it's hard to rub in & leaves you looking white.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers w/Eczema (& Everyone Else!)
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old has VERY sensitive skin and gets horrible rashes even with the most sensitive of sunscreens, but not with this! And it rubs in so quickly and easily, especially for a mineral-based sunscreen. We spent 5 hours in the Iowa Sun and didn't even get tans. The smell is amazing too - this is my new favorite and we've tried a LOT!
customer_reviews.author: David Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: holy crap it works
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend said this stuff leave no tan lines. No joke she wasn't kidding. This stuff works amazingly! It left my kids looking pastey white and a little like Casper the Ghost for the first hour after application, no matter how much I tried to rub it in. But, yeah, we were in the Florida sun for most of the day and like a bad-parent I forgot to reapply after a while. No joke, kids didn't burn. Kids barely got any tan while we were there on vacation for a week. I was so very relieved. I'll definitely be buying this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Heakin

customer_reviews.title: Extremely drying, gives leathery skin after a week
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset at this spf right now. It is extremely drying, sucks the life out of your skin. After one week my skin around my eyes are completely burnt and my neck as well. Augh..
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes A Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sunscreen based on other mom recommendations as a safe alternative to some of the drug store name brand sunscreens with toxic ingredients. Very happy with the product...applies and rubs in nicely and didn't cause any type of rash on my 10-month-old.
customer_reviews.author: LTTaniguchiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Finally a safe and practical sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I felt that it's the right thing to finally leave a review for the sunscreen we've been enjoying. This is a healthy sunscreen that is actually able to spread easily and stay on for the whole hike. My family loves it
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 9 months for our beach trip and it worked great no suburn no irritation or rashes and smells great!!! I used it on myself because my face is so sensitive and it worked great no breakouts or burning as soon as my face got wet I highly recommend this to adults and babies
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie and Kyle Cothran

customer_reviews.title: We like this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: We had a bad problem with getting burnt by another major brand of 'baby' sunscreen. so we switched to this and a 3rd brand. so far we have had no issues with being burnt with this one thankfully!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!  Kids burned!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on both of my toddler sons and myself. We all got sunburns after only an hour and a half at the beach. Thank goodness we didn’t stay in the sun longer! My wife used a different sunscreen and was not burned. We have previously used ThinkBaby and were pleased, so we ordered a brand new tube before our beach trip. Never again! Pick a different brand so your kiddos don’t get burnt like ours did.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buff

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Sunscreen that isn't a pain to apply!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is easier to apply than any other mineral sunscreen I have tried (and I’ve tried lots). It also doesn’t leave your skin white like most. We haven’t had any sunburns while using it, but are not super prone to them. It also smells AMAZING- like a light peachy scent.
customer_reviews.author: Karrathan

customer_reviews.title: No really satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I would be honest with you, we've been buying that for like 4 years every summer, my wife love it because supposedly is the best but in my opinion they're useless because my son have dark skin and we use that for being able to prevent he get really burn but this looks like it's nothing in his skin, I don't think this work really well in dark skin, maybe in white.
customer_reviews.author: Palomio

customer_reviews.title: careful to use if your baby has eczema
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has eczema so I am very care to pick a suncreen product. My pediatrician recommend this brand and I give it a try. But maybe my daughter's is too sensitive. After I use it, my baby's eczema get worse than before although I have wash her face as soon as possible. Since I have open it I cannot return it so I will use it on my face :(
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old breaks out in a rash from most sunscreens, but not this one! This works great. It is not the most spreadable, and since it's mineral based, still leaves a bit of a white cast even when it is rubbed in, but the good news is, it works, and she's rash free.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ingrassia

customer_reviews.title: Great protection with no stain.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this product was because it did not have the ingredients that stain your clothes. The summer has just started, but this product seems to protect my skin perfectly. It does go on with a white hue because of the zinc but soon blends in nicely. I would absolutely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: P Squared

customer_reviews.title: goes on thick but protects your kids
customer_reviews.text: love that it has a great EWG rating and it's affordable and accessible. it doesn't rub in very well (especially if we're talking wiggly toddlers) but i think part of it going on thick is why it protects your kids so well and over a long period of time. We just got back from a week long beach trip and we didn't have any sunburns despite an entire day in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen! One of the few I can find with safe ingredients. It spreads easy. Sometimes leaves the skin looking white but that fades quickly. My toddler and I have sensitive skin and both of us haven't had an issue with this. We have been using this sunscreen since he was a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L.

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen! It spreads nicely, protects well, smells good and is nice on our little guys skin. He seems to have very sensitive skin so I was thrilled when this didn’t seem to irritate his skin
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sunscreen and good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen! It’s great for babies with sensitive skin. I love how it spreads on thick because it feels like my sons skin is well protected. We went to Hawaii, Mexico and the Caribbean with this sunscreen and never experienced a sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen for the most sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunscreen besides one other that I can put on myself and my daughter. Our eyes swell up with other sunscreens. We have super sensitive skin.. i guess other sunscreens have horrible chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Koren

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever! EWG certified. We won’t let anyone in our pool wear any other sunscreen because we don’t want to swim in chemicals. We keep dozens of bottles of this stuff on hand.
customer_reviews.author: GoodHavens

customer_reviews.title: Best kids' sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is far and above my favorite sunscreen for my kids. It smells amazing (like a dreamsicle!) so my kids don't mind me putting it on them, and it covers and protects so well. We are all fair-skinned so I am hyper vigilant about sun protection. The EWG gives it a high score, so it's safe for your little one's delicate skin (my kids have very sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate them at all). I use it myself, too, and really like it. I go through several bottles each summer!
customer_reviews.author: CFL

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought for child going through chemo. Spreads easily without being too thick. I haven’t had any problems with her getting burned. Really nice smell staring off. After a while, it just smells like sunscreen. No bother to me though as that’s why I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scent and spreads easily!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my 2 year old at least 3 times a week! It's such a pleasant scent. The fact that zinc oxide is the only active ingredient makes me giddy! Safest stuff here! Also, it doesn't make him look like a ghost. It spreads very easily and soaks in quickly comparatively speaking!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy, Leaves White Film
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family uses this sunscreen due to my sensitive daughter. The sun protection is reliable, with 2 applications needed per whole beach day, which I expect. She doesn't break out, but it does tend to dry her out a where she has eczema. I'm not a fan of the white film that remains for hours on dryer areas of my skin. I'm happy though that the ingredients seem safe and my daughter doesn't react to it.
customer_reviews.author: A&B4G

customer_reviews.title: Only sunscreen I used for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love this sun screen for my three year old!!! Only thing I will use on her sensitive skin. It’s a bit thick so it’s a bit harder than others to apply, but it’s well worth it for the hours and hours of protection it offers with no reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: We love think baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen is thick but great. I’ve one research and this seems to have a lot less toxins than other brands. I only have to reapply if we are outside for over 3 hours. My son is very fair skinned and this always protects him.
customer_reviews.author: EvaHearts612

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for Thinkbaby!
customer_reviews.text: Originally was using Babyganics for my toddler.... he has eczema and sensitive skin in general so he broke out using Babyganics. After some research, some other moms suggested Thinkbaby and I’m so glad they did! It’s awesome knowing my son is not being exposed to harmful and irritating ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to spread, not sticky. Good protection!
customer_reviews.text: My 1yo was at the beach and at the pool using this sunscreen and she was totally fine, didn’t get red at all. Smells a bit like coconut. Hope it’s natural as advertised. Easy to spread and not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Fia

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my 1YRO and 6YRO. They both have sensitive skin and tend to rub SS in their eyes. This has beat the eye test and I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love this natural sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love natural sunscreen for my kiddos! This does leave a white residue because my kids don’t sit still long enough to rub it in all the way for it to go away but besides that we LOVE this sunscreen. It’s non greasy and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail sunscreen for my son! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen and use it on my son. This is the second bottle I've bought, first I tried the smaller size, we went through it anD I liked it so much I bought the larger size. It has protected him from the sun in AZ and the California beach. He still gets a little color, but has never even come close to burning. It does well in the water and is easy to rub in. This is all I will use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Addicct

customer_reviews.title: Not Great For Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My son has very sensitive skin so I did a lot of research prior to selecting a sunscreen. I heard and read lots of great things about Think Baby. Unfortunately, his face and arms still break out after each use. I use exactly as instructed on the directions and he still got too much sun. I’ll be looking for a new sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: RaeRae

customer_reviews.title: Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. It is very thick and not easy to blend into darker complexions but I appreciate the safe ingredients versus harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suffers from eczema and this sunscreen is great to spread and her skin tolerated it! She likes the orange smell
customer_reviews.author: Csmr

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and works
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen better than the Australian baby sunscreen. It's got a great floral smell while the other one was just plain bland. It's not watery and just enough thickness to it to apply and stay on. My son is still getting tan due to the weather and heat this summer but that's just normal.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Its very pasty so be patient when applying.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this baby version was the highest so i got it but my kid still burned. I like that its more natural amd safe but it did not do its job entirely. I reapply faithfully every 80 minutes, even sooner when i realized his skin was so red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen EVER
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an amazon prime member for years, I’m not one to write reviews even if I like something but this product or worthy of my first review. This is the only sunscreen I use on my 2 yr old and I’ve been using it ever since he was 6 months old. My son is outside every single day if the weather is nice and he has yet to get a sunburn!! Amazon has the best price on this (target sells for 25$) that I have found so far. If you’re looking for a safe, reliable sunscreen product for your kid definitely give this one a try! I will never purchase another sunscreen brand. Thank you think baby!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for babies over 6 months old
customer_reviews.text: We live in S. Florida and the sun is brutal. I’ve used it on my babies since they were 6 months old. It’s easy to apply, thick, and provides good sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 children, 3 with sensitive skin. Works great for entire family. You must follow directions like any other sunscreen and reapply every 2 hours. Apply 15 min before sun exposure. I follow these steps every time and my kids don’t burn at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My son reacts to most soaps and lotions (including alot of diffrent sunscreens) but hasnt had any issues with this one, it doesn't smell like a normal sunscreen and he hasnt burned at all since I started using it! Also unlike blue lizard sunscreen think baby is super easy to spread not to thick and not to thin which I really appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: Caleigh Gay

customer_reviews.title: Great product for babies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 month old son, and I gotta say its amazing! Its not too thick of a consistency, and it does not leave that white residue after applying. It smells amazing too which makes it easier for the baby to endure it. I make sure to reapply every two three hours or when u feel like its dried on their skinz.
customer_reviews.author: Ohnoitsbena

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Used on my lily white 2 year old all last summer. Had her on the beach lots and she never got burned. Worked great. She's not a huge fan of the water and I only reapplied one time during the day. Feels good knowing I'm not using all of those chemicals that can be endocrine-disrupting or carcinogens. Went on smooth (texture of other sunscreens I've tried was clumpy) and absorbed fairly easy. Non-nano zinc oxide is the way to go. I've found my family's forever sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: HNR

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kids sunscreen by far. Runs into skin well without leaving overly greasy or white residue, and it smells good. Good coverage too.
customer_reviews.author: CC26

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! It isn't too thick or hard to spread on the twins and it's smells amazing. One application lasts quite a while even in water and sand. It absorbs faster than I am used to which is great and doesn't leave the skin feeling sticky after. Definitely buying more!
customer_reviews.author: JLBevington

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My son has super sensitive skin. Other sunscreens would break him out in horrible rashes but this stuff works great on him. Put it on him once and he played outside for hours without any redness. Great for kids with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: babies
customer_reviews.text: It's great for babies, but I also use it for my sensitive skin, but it's like a thick layer of flour on my face, and it will come off. Hope to do better than stick to the service
customer_reviews.author: liya

customer_reviews.title: Very Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Is thick and very hard to wash off! The smell is odd and takes time to adjust to since it doesn’t smell like typical sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son with Eczema
customer_reviews.text: My son is a little over a year and has eczema. From him, this sunscreen works extremely well with his skin and keeps his eczema from flaring up. I've seen some comments that this sunscreen has had the opposite effect on their children with eczema, causing flair ups, which is a frustrating battle as a parent with a child that has eczema. This sunscreen though is definitely one I would at least try if your child has eczema.
customer_reviews.author: MT3

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty good product. Seems It irritates my eyes and runs in to them while in the water so I try not to get "anywhere near" them. Overall I've tried many natural sunscreens and this is above average.
customer_reviews.author: funkster

customer_reviews.title: Only sunscreen for eczema!
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers both get eczema on their cheeks and most sunscreens make them flare up. ThinkBaby is the only one we’ve had any luck with. And bonus, it goes on well for a mineral sunscreen and also smells great.
customer_reviews.author: BS23

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am particular about what sun products I will use on my son. This has limited additives, goes one quick and easy, smells great and keeps my kid’s sensitive Irish skin protected. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: The very best...
customer_reviews.text: The only brand we use. It’s effective and blends in well. Smells nice and live that there’s no junk in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Trame

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sunscreen - for the WHOLE family!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite sunscreen! It's good to know it's mineral based so I'm not applying dangerous to my children or myself. We all use it - my kids, my husband, me. It works great. It's a thicker sunscreen so a little can go a long way. It has a pleasant citrus-y smell. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another sunscreen on my son after trying this product! It spreads easily despite its thickness. It is completely non-greasy to the point that I often use it as a facial sunscreen for myself over my tinted moisturizer. I feel like my baby is well protected with this sunscreen, and another bonus is it doesn't have that typical chemical smell. To me it has a lemon-y coconut smell.
customer_reviews.author: A. McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Clean ingredients. We don't use sunscreen unless it's a long day out but when we do, it's this one!
customer_reviews.author: MillFactory

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: My family has fair skin and high risk of melanoma so we wear a lot of sunscreen. I wanted something I could put on my kids multiple times a day without all the harsh chemicals, that would rub in easily and provide good coverage. This fits the bill all around -- we have had no sunburns! The lotion is creamy and not hard to rub in like other kids' formulas. And the smell is like oranges and cream! Good enough to eat! Will be using this regularly from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection. Thick, but easy to spread on.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit goes a long way. I had 2 tubes of think sport last year and it took my 2 kiddos a year to finish them. My 1 year old was sensitive to most sunscreens and would break out in eczema. She’s had no reaction to the think baby. Great sun protection. Thick, but easy to spread on.
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sunburn
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but honestly I’m just so upset. I bought this for myself because I’m fair-skinned and pregnant, so I needed a strong non-chemical sunscreen. Wore this to the beach yesterday, reapplied as directed, and yet developed the worst sunburn I’ve had in years. It literally just doesn’t work. I’ve never had an experience like this in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and good on baby's skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my one year old's skin for sun protection. I love that its gentle on her skin, and so far we've used it in Hawaii on vacation and for some 80 degree days in Seattle and she has never gotten burned.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second summer we have used this. Easy to put on, not greasy. I put this in my kids and on myself and have not had any problems. My daughter has eczema and this did not bother her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Long, Non-Toxic
customer_reviews.text: I use this to surf and it holds up really well. The scent is very pleasant, not too potent, and it lasts for at least an 1 to 1.5 hours in the water. I love how it's non-toxic and just generally better for the environment. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: HammerHead Showers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I always have my doubts when using a more natural product because for me they don’t always work. This was recommended to me by my neighbor and I went ahead and ordered it and I have no regrets! It works great at the pool. Even when the kids get wet. My boys are 7 and 9.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Mantel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Spreads easy, worked perfectly with heavy splashing in a wading pool with a water table. Was in the Colorado sun for an hour in the water with no burn. Smells like orange creamsicles. Also gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Milan

customer_reviews.title: good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: my friend bought this product for her kids. she recommended me buy one too. my skin is sensitive. After I used this, i have not felt uncomfortable. I vote 4 star for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great for entire family!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my family for the past couple years. We never burn (live in New England with summers around 80 degrees), smells AMAZING, spreads evenly and dries nicely. Non toxic ingredients and non-nano zinc oxide are super important to us. This sunscreen checks all boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V

product_meta.title: Thinkbaby Safe Sunscreen SPF 50+ (6 ounce)
product_meta.description:
Size:6 Ounce (Pack of 1)Thinkbaby Safe Sunscreen was the first sunscreen to pass Whole Foods Premium Care requirements, and has held the highest rating in EWG's database since 2010 with a “1” rating. As a company, Thinkbaby targets products containing questionable ingredients and develops safer alternatives. We led the movement from BPA, with the 1st BPA-free baby bottle (2006) to the 1st insulated BPA-free sports bottle (2006). We brought the same focus to developing body care and sun care products. None of our products have ever contained avobenzone, oxybenzone, parabens, phthalates, PABA, or 1,4 dioxane, to name a few of the chemicals of concern.

At SPF 50+ with broad-spectrum protection for UVA and UVB, and the highest water resistance allowed by the FDA, you can expect a highly effective solution for your littles and whole family. We are strictly against the use of aerosols due to inhalation concerns to the effectiveness and safety for users and the environment. Our mineral based (zinc oxide) formulations go on smooth and absorb easily without leaving you feeling sticky or goopy.

Thinkbaby Safe Sunscreen has received a large amount of awards and has been featured in a tremendous number of publications including: Allure, Martha Stewart, New York Times, POPSUGAR, Travel & Leisure, The Bump, FoodBabe, Washington Post, Chicago Tribune, Natural Child, Whole Living, FitPregnancy, Baby List, Pregnancy & Newborn, and Parents to name a few.

Member of: Sun Safety Coalition, Safe Sun Council, Safe Cosmetics Campaign.
feature_bullets: First sunscreen to pass Whole Foods Premium Care requirements and top-rated by EWG since creation in 2010 with a “1” rating. Recipient of a tremendous amount of awards
Free of biologically harmful chemicals like avobenzone, oxybenzone, paraben, phthalates, PABA, 1,4 dioxane, and UV chemical absorbers
Highly effective with an SPF at 50+. Highest level of water resistance per the FDA (80-minute water resistance) and broad-spectrum coverage for UVA and UVB
Reef Friendly: Free of known reef damaging chemicals and highly biodegradable. Non-nano zinc oxide formulation, non-aerosol formulation
Applies and absorbs easily without the oily feeling or obtrusive smell of traditional sunscreens. Leaping Bunny certified cruelty free, gluten free & vegan
